page.title: 16Holiday with my parents.
page.content: A few years ago I went for a holiday with my parents to Rhyl,in Wales. We travelled by car from Cumbria and it took us about six hours to get there. We stayed in a Guest House and the owner of the house was called Jenny. She had to get up early because she had to make everyone's breakfast.At nine o'clock she would ring a bell to tell everyone that breakfast was served. We had cereals followed by bacon and egg and toast to finish.We also drank tea or coffee. We went shopping for presents while we were on holiday and spent a lot of time on the beach,sun_bathing.We also visited Chester Zoo while we were at Rhyl,as it is not very far to travel.While I was on holiday I made friends with some other children and we played games together. I would like to spend another holiday there.
